name: Hill Climb Racing 3
description:
UP/DOWN ARROWS to control the car.

Unlock vehicles and tracks. Beat world highscores.

Remember to SAVE the PROGRESS, go to the menu and click
"save progress" button, store code in a text file or a comment ;)
Got bored? Here you have maxed code, use it:
5070778899960204070796622333654730131

Should any of vehicles be better? Any other Glitches?
